title: Agrify's Pivot With CEO Raymond Chang
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Agrify (AGFY) CEO Raymond Chang joined me last year to discuss indoor vertical farming. We recorded this interview before Agrify's recent stock split, but we do discuss the current challenging environment and the pivot the company is now focused on. Rapid deployment, the necessity for consistency, addressing industry pain points and growing segments.
